basics.name: Cristiano Pedersini
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Born and raised in Italy, studied in Italy, Australia and Japan. Engineer, computer programmer, amateur bodybuilder and coffee freak with a passionate interest for new experiences, challenges and people. Quick learner, troubleshooter and always constructively critical.

highlights: Otakyou: e-commerce web application based on Ruby on Rails, Unicorn and Nginx.
Web application for payed video streaming, with social network features. Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Unicorn and Nginx.
Living Surface: Interactive application for events. People tracking and realistic interaction with projected visual effects. Unity, Mono, C#, Kinect.
Mobile web and native Android app, with in app-purchase features. Java, javascript, HTML, Android Webviews.
Video rendering pipeline for automatic batch creation of video presentations. Unity, Mono, C#, Ruby on Rails.

references.name: Simone Pellegrino
references.reference:
Cristiano is a very hard worker. His unique aim is to reach the goal, no matter what's the price to pay. His motto is "Either we heal as a team or we are going to crumble. Inch by inch, play by play, till we're finished" inspired from Al Pacino's most famous speech.
There is no night passed on buggy code in which his dedication wasn't absolutely total and it was incredible how he motivated people to reach their goals breaking out their own limits.
His knowledge in software engineering is absolutely strong and proficient.
